title: Plagues of Livestock, Boils, and Hail
summary: Exodus 9 continues the plagues. Egyptian livestock die, people and animals suffer boils, and a severe hailstorm devastates crops. Pharaoh’s heart remains hard despite these escalating judgments.

faq.question: Did the plagues affect the Israelites?
faq.answer: No, God protected the Israelites’ livestock and land from the plagues.

faq.question: Why did Pharaoh refuse to let the Israelites go?
faq.answer: His heart was hardened, and he would not submit to God’s authority.
